Invoice Quick

- Single-file HTML app with inline CSS and JavaScript; no external dependencies or libraries
- Purpose: Small business invoice generator and tracker for service providers and freelancers
- Core Features:
  - Create invoices with client name, service description, hourly rate, hours worked, and due date
  - Auto-calculate subtotal, tax (configurable %), and total amount
  - Generate unique invoice numbers (format: INV-YYYYMMDD-####)
  - Store all invoices in browser localStorage as JSON
  - View list of all saved invoices with status (draft/sent/paid)
  - Edit or delete existing invoices
  - Export invoice as printable HTML (print-friendly layout)
  - Dark mode toggle for accessibility
- Keyboard Support:
  - Tab through all form fields in logical order
  - Enter key submits invoice form
  - Escape key closes modals
  - Arrow keys navigate invoice list
  - Delete key removes selected invoice (with confirmation)
- Drag-and-Drop:
  - Reorder invoices in list by dragging
  - Drag to set invoice status (drag to "Paid" zone to mark paid)
- Offline-First:
  - All data persists in localStorage; works completely offline
  - No server calls required
  - Data survives browser restarts
- UI/UX:
  - Clean, minimal interface optimized for small screens
  - Form validation with inline error messages
  - Summary dashboard showing total outstanding, total paid, invoice count
  - Search/filter invoices by client name or invoice number
  - Color-coded status indicators (draft=gray, sent=blue, paid=green)
- Technical:
  - Single index.html file with embedded CSS in <style> tag and JS in <script> tag
  - localStorage key: "invoices_data" storing array of invoice objects
  - No build step; open file directly in browser
  - Responsive design; works on desktop and tablet
